pages.title: Nick-Aluminum Vein
pages.text: Nick-Aluminum Vein has a medium reserve of both Aluminum and Nickel
Main Ore:Aluminum$(br)Associated Ores:Nickel$(br2)Heights:35-58$(br2)Vein Spreadth:Medium$(br)Vein Density:Low$(br2)Indicator:Amethyst Glow Rose$(br)Vein Rarity:Medium$(br2)Dimension:Overworld
